articles.author: Aura Sabadus
articles.title: Ukraine Ends Party for Europe’s Gas Addicts - Center for European Policy Analysis
articles.description: Ukraine has halted Russian gas flows across its territory. But is this the end of the continent’s turbulent energy relationship with Russia?
articles.content: The expiry of Ukraines five-year gas transit deal with Russia came at the end of a bitter tug-of-war between those seeing any extension as a betrayal of Ukraines war-exhausted population, and Kremlin… [+5464 chars]
